sources.title: Hush Money | Full Drama Thriller Ransom Movie | Spanish
sources.description:
Hush Money - An art teacher's plans fall apart when he kidnaps a ballplayer's daughter to repay a debt to a ruthless mob boss.
Stars: Kennedy Waite, Portia Prescott, Holly Westwood
